name: Holly Roberts
education: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Advertising, University of Oklahoma, 2013-2017

responsibilities: Lead the Mission Foods client service team, supervising Assistant Account Executive and Account Executive.
Collaborate with Senior Account Director to achieve client business goals.

Oversee initiatives related to creative development, print production, photoshoots, paid media planning and buying, organic social content, influencer marketing, digital campaign reporting, and website development/maintenance.
Identify account growth opportunities based on SOW performance and CPG industry trends.
Primary contact for all client requests under the Mission Foods account.
Manage projects while building client relationships and providing strategic perspectives.
Implemented process improvements for project management and workflow efficiency.
Managed day-to-day client communications for Mission Foods.
Handled trafficking of deliverables, led client calls, and provided solutions as needed.
Owned the internal creative and digital request process from brief execution to final file release.
Managed client projects for the Capital One account from concept to delivery.
Facilitated creative development for various initiatives including email, display, direct mail, and branding.
Maintained adherence to client vision and goals.
Prepared, coordinated, and executed lifestyle photoshoots for the ALDI account.
Collaborated with client partners and internal teams to ensure cohesive project execution.
Managed client communications and maintained client vision during the production process.
Developed and executed strategic local marketing plans for the Midas client.
Presented recommendations and creative products to franchisees in assigned markets.
Managed budgets and tracked marketing plan results.
Ensured timely execution of local Midas marketing plans.
Handled client and vendor communications, media placement, and budget maintenance.
Facilitated projects between creative teams, franchisees, and vendors.
Maintained and developed direct marketing and email campaigns for AT&T Customer Retention.
Managed campaign tracking and reporting tools.
Handled production billing and budgets.
Assisted with client relations and business development.
Created weekly blog posts and social media content calendars.
Managed email newsletters and monitored online reviews.
Generated social media content for various clients.
Managed social media content calendars and gathered digital analytics.
Updated client websites and assisted in website creation.
Assisted in strategic planning for the Adventure Road initiative.
Coordinated photo and video shoots and managed talent releases.
Prepared presentation materials for agency and client meetings.
Maintained social media for 25+ accounts.
Created marketing strategy plans including brand analysis and media objectives.
Produced email newsletters and marketing imagery.
Enhanced social media presence across multiple platforms.
Created and updated the company website using WordPress.
Designed product showcases and managed online product listings.

bio: Ambitious, adaptable marketing professional with over 6 years of experience helping brands tell their story in a meaningful way. I have a proven track record of leading talented teams to deliver successful marketing campaigns that resonate across audiences and generate impactful results. With a passion for the sweet spot where creativity and data-driven strategy meet, I get just as excited about the bigger picture as I do about the day-to-day details. I thrive in collaborative environments, working with multiple disciplines to reach a united goal and deliver exceptional work.
